categories.name: Writing & Content
categories.description: AI-powered writing and content creation tools

categories.name: Code & Dev Tools
categories.description: AI coding assistants and development tools

categories.name: Image Generation
categories.description: AI image creation and editing tools

categories.name: Video Generation
categories.description: AI video creation and editing tools

categories.name: Audio & Speech
categories.description: Voice synthesis, transcription, and audio tools

services.name: ChatGPT
services.tagline: Advanced AI assistant powered by GPT-4
services.briefDescription: ChatGPT is OpenAI's conversational AI that can help with writing, analysis, coding, and creative tasks. Available with GPT-3.5 (free) and GPT-4 (paid) models.
services.fullDescription: ChatGPT represents the cutting edge of conversational AI, offering natural language understanding and generation capabilities. It excels at tasks ranging from creative writing and code generation to complex problem-solving and data analysis. The platform includes web browsing, code interpretation, and DALL-E image generation in premium tiers.

keyFeatures.title: Code Interpreter
keyFeatures.description: Execute Python code and analyze data

services.name: Claude
services.tagline: AI assistant focused on being helpful, harmless, and honest
services.briefDescription: Claude is Anthropic's AI assistant known for nuanced thinking, strong coding abilities, and careful reasoning. Available in multiple model sizes including the powerful Claude 3 Opus.
services.fullDescription: Claude represents Anthropic's approach to safe and capable AI. It excels at complex reasoning tasks, long-form content creation, and technical analysis. Claude can process very long documents (up to 200K tokens), making it ideal for analyzing codebases, research papers, and extensive documentation.

keyFeatures.title: Constitutional AI
keyFeatures.description: Built with safety and helpfulness in mind

keyFeatures.title: Strong Coding Skills
keyFeatures.description: Excellent at debugging and code generation

keyFeatures.title: Artifacts
keyFeatures.description: Create and iterate on documents and code

services.name: GitHub Copilot
services.tagline: Your AI pair programmer
services.briefDescription: GitHub Copilot uses AI to suggest code completions and entire functions in real-time, right in your editor. Powered by OpenAI Codex and trained on billions of lines of code.
services.fullDescription: GitHub Copilot revolutionizes coding by providing intelligent code suggestions as you type. It understands context from comments and code, suggesting complete lines or entire functions. Copilot supports dozens of languages and integrates seamlessly with popular IDEs. The chat feature allows for code explanations, debugging help, and test generation.

keyFeatures.title: Real-time Suggestions
keyFeatures.description: Get code completions as you type

keyFeatures.title: Multi-language Support
keyFeatures.description: Works with all major programming languages

services.name: Midjourney
services.tagline: AI-powered image generation for artists and designers
services.briefDescription: Midjourney creates stunning, artistic images from text descriptions. Known for its distinctive aesthetic style and high-quality outputs, it's popular among artists and designers.
services.fullDescription: Midjourney has become synonymous with high-quality AI art generation. It excels at creating artistic, stylized images with a unique aesthetic. The platform operates through Discord, offering various controls for style, composition, and variation. Version 6 brings photorealistic capabilities while maintaining artistic excellence.

services.name: Perplexity AI
services.tagline: AI-powered search engine with real-time information
services.briefDescription: Perplexity combines large language models with real-time web search to provide accurate, up-to-date answers with citations. It's designed for research and fact-finding.
services.fullDescription: Perplexity AI reimagines search by combining the conversational abilities of LLMs with real-time web access. Every answer includes citations to sources, making it ideal for research, fact-checking, and staying current. The Pro version offers access to GPT-4, Claude, and other premium models with enhanced search capabilities.

keyFeatures.title: Source Citations
keyFeatures.description: Every claim is backed by sources

keyFeatures.title: Focus Modes
keyFeatures.description: Search specific domains like academic papers

services.name: ElevenLabs
services.tagline: The most realistic AI voice generator
services.briefDescription: ElevenLabs offers cutting-edge AI voice synthesis technology that creates incredibly realistic speech. Clone voices, generate speech in multiple languages, and create audio content at scale.
services.fullDescription: ElevenLabs has set the standard for AI voice generation with their proprietary models that produce remarkably human-like speech. The platform supports voice cloning from just minutes of audio, multilingual synthesis, and emotional control. It's widely used for audiobooks, video narration, podcasts, and accessibility applications.

keyFeatures.title: Voice Cloning
keyFeatures.description: Create custom voices from audio samples

services.name: Supabase
services.tagline: The open source Firebase alternative
services.briefDescription: Supabase provides a complete backend platform with PostgreSQL database, authentication, real-time subscriptions, and storage. Build production-ready apps with a generous free tier.
services.fullDescription: Supabase offers developers a comprehensive backend-as-a-service platform built on open source technologies. At its core is a PostgreSQL database with real-time capabilities, combined with authentication, storage, and edge functions. The platform provides instant APIs, row-level security, and a user-friendly dashboard, making it ideal for rapid application development.

services.name: Cursor
services.tagline: The AI-first code editor
services.briefDescription: Cursor is a fork of VS Code rebuilt from the ground up for AI-assisted programming. It offers advanced code completion, chat, and the ability to edit multiple files with AI commands.
services.fullDescription: Cursor represents a new paradigm in code editors by deeply integrating AI throughout the development experience. Built on VS Code's foundation, it adds powerful features like multi-file editing with AI, codebase-aware chat, and predictive editing. The editor understands your entire project context and can make complex changes across files.

keyFeatures.title: Multi-file Editing
keyFeatures.description: Change multiple files with one command

services.name: Runway
services.tagline: AI-powered creative tools for video
services.briefDescription: Runway offers a suite of AI tools for video creation and editing, including text-to-video, video-to-video transformations, and advanced editing features powered by machine learning.
services.fullDescription: Runway is pioneering AI-native video creation tools. Their Gen-2 model enables text-to-video generation, while other tools offer green screen removal, motion tracking, and style transfer. The platform is designed for creative professionals who want to push the boundaries of video content creation using AI.

services.name: Jasper
services.tagline: AI copilot for enterprise marketing teams
services.briefDescription: Jasper is an AI writing assistant designed for marketing teams and content creators. It helps generate blog posts, social media content, emails, and more while maintaining brand voice.
services.fullDescription: Jasper has evolved from a writing tool to a comprehensive AI platform for enterprise marketing. It offers brand voice training, campaign creation, and integration with marketing workflows. The platform can generate content across formats while maintaining consistency with brand guidelines and tone.

keyFeatures.title: Brand Voice
keyFeatures.description: Train AI on your brand's unique voice

services.name: Replicate
services.tagline: Run AI models in the cloud with an API
services.briefDescription: Replicate lets you run machine learning models in the cloud from your own code, without having to set up any servers. Browse thousands of models or deploy your own.
services.fullDescription: Replicate democratizes access to AI models by providing a simple API interface to thousands of open-source models. Developers can run models for image generation, language processing, audio synthesis, and more without managing infrastructure. The platform handles scaling, GPU allocation, and model versioning automatically.

keyFeatures.title: Auto-scaling
keyFeatures.description: Scales from zero to handle traffic

limitations: Costs can add up with heavy usage

services.name: Notion AI
services.tagline: AI integrated into your workspace
services.briefDescription: Notion AI brings AI capabilities directly into your Notion workspace. Write, brainstorm, edit, and summarize without switching tools. Perfect for teams already using Notion.
services.fullDescription: Notion AI seamlessly integrates artificial intelligence into the popular all-in-one workspace. It can help with writing, summarizing meeting notes, extracting action items, translating content, and answering questions about your workspace data. The AI understands context from your pages and databases, making it particularly powerful for knowledge work.

services.name: Vercel AI SDK
services.tagline: The AI Toolkit for TypeScript
services.briefDescription: Vercel AI SDK is an open-source library for building AI-powered applications. It provides React hooks and streaming utilities for popular AI providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, and more.
services.fullDescription: The Vercel AI SDK simplifies building AI applications in TypeScript and React. It handles the complexity of streaming responses, managing conversation state, and switching between AI providers. The SDK supports all major LLM providers and includes utilities for function calling, structured outputs, and edge runtime compatibility.

keyFeatures.title: Provider Agnostic
keyFeatures.description: Works with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and more

services.name: Make
services.tagline: Design, build, and automate anything
services.briefDescription: Make (formerly Integromat) is a visual automation platform that connects apps and services without code. Build complex workflows with AI integrations, data transformations, and conditional logic.
services.fullDescription: Make provides a powerful visual interface for creating automated workflows between thousands of apps and services. Its strength lies in complex scenario building with routers, filters, and error handling. The platform excels at data transformation and supports advanced features like webhooks, custom API calls, and AI model integration.

services.name: Hugging Face
services.tagline: The AI community building the future
services.briefDescription: Hugging Face is the platform where the machine learning community collaborates on models, datasets, and applications. Host and deploy models, access thousands of pre-trained models, and build ML apps.
services.fullDescription: Hugging Face has become the GitHub of machine learning, hosting over 300,000 models and 50,000 datasets. The platform offers model hosting, Spaces for ML app deployment, and enterprise solutions. Their Transformers library is the de facto standard for working with state-of-the-art NLP models, while their Inference API provides easy access to thousands of models.

services.name: Leonardo.AI
services.tagline: AI image generation for creators
services.briefDescription: Leonardo.AI specializes in creating game assets, concept art, and design elements. It offers fine-tuned models for specific styles and use cases, with features tailored for creative professionals.
services.fullDescription: Leonardo.AI has carved out a niche in AI image generation by focusing on the needs of game developers, concept artists, and designers. The platform offers specialized models trained on specific art styles, advanced control features like ControlNet, and tools for creating consistent character designs and game assets. Its Canvas feature allows for AI-powered image editing and expansion.

keyFeatures.title: Custom Models
keyFeatures.description: Train models on your art style

services.name: Codeium
services.tagline: Free AI code completion and chat
services.briefDescription: Codeium offers free AI-powered code completion and chat for individuals. It supports 70+ languages and integrates with all major IDEs, providing an accessible alternative to GitHub Copilot.
services.fullDescription: Codeium democratizes AI coding assistance by offering a generous free tier for individual developers. It provides intelligent code completions, function generation, and an AI chat interface for coding questions. The tool supports a wide range of programming languages and integrates seamlessly with popular development environments. Enterprise features include self-hosting options and enhanced security.

keyFeatures.title: IDE Integration
keyFeatures.description: Works with VS Code, JetBrains, Vim, etc.

services.name: Writesonic
services.tagline: AI writer for SEO-optimized content
services.briefDescription: Writesonic combines AI writing with SEO optimization tools. It includes features for article writing, keyword research, and content optimization, making it popular among content marketers.
services.fullDescription: Writesonic positions itself as a comprehensive content creation platform with a strong focus on SEO. Beyond basic AI writing, it offers tools for keyword research, competitor analysis, and SERP analysis. The platform includes Chatsonic (an AI chatbot with real-time data), Botsonic (custom chatbot builder), and various specialized writing tools for different content types.

services.name: Pinecone
services.tagline: The vector database for AI applications
services.briefDescription: Pinecone is a fully managed vector database that makes it easy to build high-performance AI applications. It's designed for storing and querying vector embeddings at scale.
services.fullDescription: Pinecone provides the infrastructure for semantic search, recommendation systems, and other AI applications that rely on vector similarity. It handles the complexity of indexing and querying high-dimensional vectors, offering features like metadata filtering, namespace isolation, and hybrid search. The serverless architecture means no infrastructure management is required.

services.name: Stable Diffusion API
services.tagline: Open-source image generation model API
services.briefDescription: Stability AI's official API for Stable Diffusion models. Generate images, edit existing ones, and upscale with the latest open-source image generation technology.
services.fullDescription: Stability AI provides official API access to their Stable Diffusion models, including SDXL and the latest versions. The API offers image generation, image-to-image transformation, inpainting, and upscaling. As the creators of Stable Diffusion, they provide optimized inference and early access to new model releases. The platform supports various control methods and style customization.

keyFeatures.title: Latest Models
keyFeatures.description: Access to SDXL and newest versions
